price: (144) He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.[1304]
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
footnotes: [1304]- Meaning that the belly of the fish would have become his grave.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
